meanings.sent1: The ionisers in the air purifier help remove harmful particles.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new ioniser for my home to improve air quality.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the ionisers, creating a cloud of ions in the room.
meanings.sent4: The ionisers hummed softly, like a choir of tiny angels creating a purifying aura.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the room with the ionisers felt like stepping into a fresh, mountain breeze.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that ionizes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was known as the best ioniser in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The ionisers in the experiment helped separate the charged particles.
meanings.sent3: The ionisers at the party were the life of the event, attracting everyone with their electric charm.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as ionisers, charging the atmosphere with excitement and energy.
meanings.sent5: The ionisers on the dance floor lit up the room, creating a vibrant and electrifying ambiance.
